message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this product. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but that price is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay $12,000 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $17,000
I appreciate you meeting me a bit, Alice.  How about we settle at $14,000?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to compromise at $16,000
Alice, this is getting close to what I can do. I'd be willing to pay $14,500, but that's really my limit.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $14,500. I'll meet you at $15,500
